Title: 667: Jen Simmons on Declarative Web Push, Form Control Styling, & More
Description:
Show Description

Jen Simmons stops by to talk about new CSS and Safari features like Form Control Styling, Declarative Web Push, Typography, contrast-color(), and more.

Listen on Website →

Guests

Jen Simmons

Guest's Main URL • Guest's Social

Safari & WebKit Evangelist. Member of the CSS Working Group. Webmaster since 1996.
